Module nl.meron.yaeger
Package nl.meron.yaeger.engine.entities.entity.shape.text

Class DynamicTextEntity

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.meron.yaeger.engine.entities.entity.JavaFXEntity
      • nl.meron.yaeger.engine.entities.entity.shape.text.TextEntity
        • nl.meron.yaeger.engine.entities.entity.shape.text.DynamicTextEntity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Anchorable, Bounded, ContinuousRotatable, Entity, BufferedMoveable, DirectionProvider, MotionModifier, Moveable, SpeedProvider, NodeProvider, Placeable, Removeable, Rotatable, SceneChild, Initializable, DimensionsProvider, Updatable, UpdateDelegator, WithTimerList
    public abstract class DynamicTextEntity
extends TextEntity
implements UpdateDelegator, BufferedMoveable, ContinuousRotatable
    An DynamicTextEntity extends all behaviour of a TextEntity, but also implements the Updatable Interface.
